Dephell Specifier
-----------------

Work with version specifiers.

Installation
------------

.. code:: bash

    python3 -m pip install --user dephell_specifier

Usage
-----

.. code:: python

    from dephell_specifier import RangeSpecifier

    '3.4' in RangeSpecifier('*')
    # True

    '3.4' in RangeSpecifier('<=2.7')
    # False

    '3.4' in RangeSpecifier('>2.7')
    # True

    '3.4' in RangeSpecifier('>2.7,<=3.4')
    # True

    '3.4' in RangeSpecifier('<2.7 || >=3.4')
    # True
